mapper.sql: id , menu_name, menu_type, parent_id, icon, path, component, query, is_frame, is_cache, visible, permission, delete_flag, sort_number, status, create_user_id, create_username, create_time, update_user_id, update_time, remark
mapper.select:
select
from brc_sys_menu
and menuName like concat('%', #{menu_name}, '%')

select bsm.permission from brc_sys_menu bsm left join brc_sys_role_menu bsrm on bsm.id = bsrm.menu_id left join brc_sys_user_role bsur on bsrm.role_id = bsur.role_id where bsm.status = '1' and bsm.permission is not null and bsur.user_id = #{userId}

select distinct bsm.id, bsm.menu_name, bsm.menu_type, bsm.parent_id, bsm.icon, bsm.path, bsm.component, bsm.query, bsm.is_frame, bsm.is_cache, bsm.visible, bsm.permission, bsm.sort_number, bsm.status, bsm.create_time from brc_sys_menu bsm left join brc_sys_role_menu bsrm on bsm.id = bsrm.menu_id left join brc_sys_user_role bsur on bsrm.role_id = bsur.role_id left join brc_sys_role bsr on bsur.role_id = bsr.id where bsm.menu_type in ('D', 'M') and bsm.status = '1' and bsr.status = '1' and bsur.user_id = #{userId} order by bsm.parent_id, bsm.sort_number
